alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:53PM EDT until June 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Spalding County in west central Georgia... East central Fayette County in north central Georgia... Southwestern Henry County in north central Georgia... Southern Clayton County in north central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 252 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lovejoy, or 7 miles southeast of Jonesboro, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Woolsey, Sunny Side, Lake Spivey, Towalaga, Inman, Bonanza, Luella, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Jw Smith Reservoir, Irondale, Walker Mill and Experiment. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
